thread.section_title: Gardner-White Furniture Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Gardner-White Furniture | www.gardner-white.com
thread.title: Stephen Celestini
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Stephen Celestini

author: Stephen Celestini
title: Stephen Celestini
text: Gardner-White is the best. I was called and asked what day I wanted delivery. On the day they called with a 2 hour window and then called again with a 10 minute time. The delivery man was great he put the mattresses where I wanted them and was super polite thanking me many times. Gardner-White is the best of the best.
